example.name: autogen1
example.text: Eventually , the money funds ' success forced relaxation of curbs on bank interest rates to allow banks to offer competing yields .
example.arg: of curbs on bank interest rates

example.text: a relaxation of rules governing exports of machine tools , computers and other high-technology products
